definitions.definition: An item of confectionery consisting of a piece of candy or sweet attached to a stick .
Something having the shape of a lollipop: a linear stem connected to a round body.
A sign on a stick held in front of the vehicle during a pit stop .

main_definition: An item of confectionery consisting of a piece of candy or sweet attached to a stick .
secondary_definitions: Something having the shape of a lollipop: a linear stem connected to a round body.
( motor racing ) A sign on a stick held in front of the vehicle during a pit stop .
